comment: Sweet citrus nose, oily malty feel, full and long finish
Very nice, pleasant taste, buttery, a bit oily,  a nice find, won’t be disappointed
Smell almond, wood, and citrus. There’s a green taste to it; something fresh that I can’t place. There’s a lot happening in this. Cardamom? Like a sweet bell pepper? It’s really different. I like it!
Christmas-y, warming, complex and refined. A bit like cardamom
Warm, pine, cardamon, oak, spicy. Very unique flavor. Mild oiliness. Smell is very mild. Complex, refined.
Citrus scent. Very woody, specifically pine. Oily. Nicely complex. Warm, smooth aftertaste.
Unexpectedly splendid. Strong nose, smooth and soft flavor (6 Advent19
Sweet and oak flavors, interesting combination.
Sweet, buttery aroma. Nice build and fade in the spice on the backend. An unusual dram that is unlike most others I have tried.
